entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
